entry.title: GQCP appears in RSDD2020
entry.summary: On December 3rd, I will be giving a 30-minute talk at the online Research Software Developers Day (RSDD) 2020. I'll be presenting our group's vision on reproducible research and I'll cover why the development of GQCP is necessary for the quantum chem...
